scripts.db:generate: if [ -z "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && . ../../.env; set +a; fi; pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate: if [ -z "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && . ../../.env; set +a; fi; pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: if [ -z "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && . ../../.env; set +a; fi; pnpm db:generate && pnpm exec tsx src/seed.ts
